Package com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components

Class Component

java.lang.Object
com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.Component
Direct Known Subclasses:
Camera, CameraMovement, Collider, GameObject, Grabber, PhysicsBody, PlayerCharacter, Sprite
public class Component extends Object
This is the first element in the JavaGameEngine it has a lot of functions as update, render positions scale shape the shape of the component is set by a number of points (localVerticies) there is classes in the com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.shapes package which are templates (rec, circle)

    • getChildren

      public LinkedList<Component> getChildren(Component type)
      Parameters:
      type - the specified type of the children to be returned
      Returns:
      if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the children that is a physicsBody as LinkedList

    • getAllChildren

      public LinkedList<Component> getAllChildren(Component type)
      Parameters:
      type - the specified type of the children to be returned
      Returns:
      if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the all children and all children's children that is a physicsBody as LinkedList

    • getChild

      public Component getChild(Component type)
      Parameters:
      type - the specified type of the children to be returned
      Returns:
      if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the first child that is a physicsBody as Component
